name: Dr Ray Beat
description: '''Nana Yaw Nkrumah''' born in [[Accra]], professionally known as '''Dr Ray Beat''' is a [[Ghanaian]] [[record producer]] and [[sound engineer]], who produces music ranging from [[Afrobeat]], [[Hip hop music|Hip hop]], [[Hiplife]], [[Azonto Dance|Azonto]], [[Dancehall]] and [[Afro pop music|Afropop]]. He also produced for Guru, [[Kwaw Kese]], [[Kofi Kinaata]] and more.
